name: Thomas HIBBARD, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Hibbard v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Thomas HIBBARD, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 29th day of July, 2004, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

854 A.2d 966
Thomas HIBBARD, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
